about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a passionate developer currently studying Mobile Software Development at FH Joanneum. My journey in web development started with a deep interest in creating user-friendly and visually appealing applications.
about.paragraph2: I have experience with modern web technologies like React, Next.js, TypeScript, and various backend solutions. I focus on creating responsive, accessible, and performant web applications.
about.description: I am a dedicated Mobile Software Development student at FH Joanneum with a passion for web and app development. I enjoy creating responsive applications with robust functionalityâ€”from building full-stack features and database integration to implementing APIs and routing systems.
